text.guest: *all data will be lost on logout
text.confirm_warn: THIS IS A DESTRUCTIVE ACTION ARE YOU 100% SURE OF WHAT YOUR DOING

tut.chat: use the chatbox to talk to other peoples
tut.chat-cmd: type '/help' in chat for a list of commands
tut.user-list: use this button to list connected users
tut.friend-list: use this button to list friends
tut.user: clicking on a user will show you his profile
tut.settings: change your theme / toggle crt effect in the settings
tut.move: in online / bot use ↑/↓ to move
tut.local-move: in local use w/s for player1 and ↑/↓ to move player2

about_page.web_list:
blockchain
framework to build the backend (fastify)
framwork / toolkit to build the frontend (tailwindcss)
use a database for the backend (sqlite)
about_page.usr_list:
standard user management (authentication, user profile, friends, etc...)
remote authentication using OAuth2 (support 42 and Github OAuth2)
about_page.ux_list:
Remote player
Live chat (with chat commands)
Theme management
about_page.ai_list:
AI opponent
User and game stats dashboards
about_page.cyber_list:
WAF / ModSecurity and HashiCorp Vault
Two Factor Auth and JWT tokens
about_page.devops_list:
Log management (Elasticsearch, Logstash, Kibana)
Monitoring system (Prometheus and Grafana)
about_page.accessibility_list:
Expanding browser compatibility
Support multiple languages (en, fr, es)
about_page.ssp_list:
Server side pong
Pong gameplay via CLI (rust app)
about_page.intro:
ft_transcendence is the final project of the forty two common core
it involve making a full stack app in Typescript, using database, Docker, Nodejs, HTML / CSS.
the goal of this project is to recreate the famous pong game but with some more features.
